My name is Craig Brinkerhoff and I am a PhD candidate in the [Fluvial@UMass group](https://blogs.umass.edu/cjgleason/) at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. My interests are in large-to-global scale modeling and remote sensing of river hydrology and biogeochemistry.
